    • Method Detail

      • isCommandWhitelisted

        public boolean isCommandWhitelisted(String rawCommand,
                                    org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Checks if a command is whitelisted.
        Parameters:
        rawCommand - The raw command sent by the player.
        sender - The command's sender.
        Returns:
        true if, supposing that this player is spectating, he can use this command.

      • reloadCommandsWhitelist

        public void reloadCommandsWhitelist()
        Reloads the whitelist from the stored configuration.

      • addCommandToWhitelist

        public void addCommandToWhitelist(String rawCommand,
                                  boolean save)
        Adds a command to the whitelist.
        Parameters:
        rawCommand - The raw command to add.
        save - true to save the command into the configuration file.

      • removeCommandFromWhitelist

        public void removeCommandFromWhitelist(String rawCommand,
                                       boolean save)
        Removes a command from the whitelist.
        Parameters:
        rawCommand - The raw command to remove.
        save - true to save the change into the configuration file.

      • sendSpectatorsChatMessage

        public void sendSpectatorsChatMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                      String message,
                                      boolean isAction)
        Sends a chat message on behalf of the given sender, in the spectators chat channel.
        Parameters:
        sender - The message's sender.
        message - The message.
        isAction - true if this is an action message (/me).

      • broadcastToSpectators

        public void broadcastToSpectators(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                  String message)
        Broadcasts a message to all players with spectator mode enabled, and the sender.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender of the message to broadcast.
        message - The message to broadcast.
